runs.comm: back of a length on middle, Soumya hangs back and defends it towards mid-off
similar length, angled in, Soumya shapes for a big swipe.... but he does not connect
full and shapes away outside off, glimpses of Nehra of the old. Soumya chases loosely, he still can't lay bat on ball
this is even better! Much fuller. Angled in and swings away past the outside edge with some extra bounce as well
and again! Back of a length, slides in with the angle and skirts away appreciably, leaving the batsman in a tangle Nehra generates extra bounce again. Swing and a miss
veering into the hips, this is flicked away behind square on the leg side. It is kept to three, but Nehra gestured that he wanted a better effort from the man in the deep
and Soumya welcomes him with a four. The crowd roars. Short and width outside off, angled away, slapped over cover point
back of a length, tucks the batsman up for room now, drop-and-run single in front of cover
short and Bumrah brings it back with the angle, dabbed in front of point for one
back of a length and leaves the left-hander, beating the outside edge
full and wide outside off, Soumya slashes and gets beaten again
full and outside off, this one shoots low. Possibly a slower ball from Bumrah. Soumya looks to jam his bat down on it. It beats him and hits Dhoni's pad
lovely bowling from Nehra. Back of a length incutter, Mithun who was pinned to the crease had no clue about this. He is rapped on the thigh

and Nehra strikes! The off stump is knocked back. Mithun targeted the leg side with a swipe but did not connect. Nehra angled the ball across the right-hander, pitched on a good length just outside off and swung it back to hit off stump. He's swung it so much this evening and always looked like getting a wicket
loud, loud appeal for caught behind, the umpire Shozab Raza doesn't move! That swung in sharply from back of length and went off the thigh pad to first slip for an easy catch. Good decision
more swing outside off and this time thick edge flies to third man
drives it nicely behind square and Ashwin slides in the deep, misfields a bit and then gets up slowly to cut it in again
just over mid-on! He didn't time the pull too well off the short ball, Pandya ran back a couple of steps and jumped but it went just over his right hand
full outside off, powers that drive straight to cover
another one - Sarkar is caught behind! Bumrah banged in a short ball around middle and the ball rose on Sarkar who tried to defend with a horizontal bat and the extra bounce took the glove
bit of appeal out of excitement as the ball hits the pad but only after an inside edge. Kayes barely moved his feet while defending as the ball nipped in just a bit
tries to slog the length delivery to leg but it goes past him
drives that full delivery nicely over the covers for four! Pitched up with some room and he put it away through the aerial route over the in field
better length and closer to the stumps, defends it back this time
bit too short, Sabbir moves across a bit and pulls that away nicely to the midwicket boundary
steers it delicately on the off side and it falls just short of Raina at gully! Was angling away, Sabbir poked to place it and nearly handed a catch
hits the pad around leg as it's going down leg, no time for a leg bye as Kayes misses the flick
pushes this length delivery softly into the covers for a quick single
charges down, Nehra pitches it a bit short and he swat-pulls it to mid-on

bit of a confusion for the single but they make it. Kayes pushed the ball to mid-on and took off for the run, Sabbir watched for a long time and left the crease late but Dhawan was running in a long way from the circle and threw at the bowler's end
angles it in with a short ball, Kayes tucks it towards midwicket for one
back of length outside off, hardly any room and he defends it back
short again, Sabbir pulls and gets the edge flying to third man where Nehra gets down just in time to save two. Nehra is smiling
fullish around off and Sabbir flicks it nicely by closing the face of the bat, to deep square leg
coming into the batsman, Kayes heaves it to leg but misses, takes it on the thigh pad
slightly slower on back of length outside off, Kayes mistimes the pull and it falls just short of midwicket
short ball outside off, jabs the ball towards point for a quick single
short ball to Kayes as well, he turns it away to fine leg
pulls the third short ball down and towards deep midwicket
fullish now on the pads and it's driven nicely down to long on
angles it in from short of length towards the batsman, gets a leg bye towards short fine leg
that one rose sharply! Kayes danced down the ground to smash that bu Pandya banged in a short ball which nearly hit Kayes' head on the way, before he swayed out of the line
low full toss on the pads and Sabbir reverse sweeps that cleverly past a diving short third man for four!
on length now on off and middle, he defends it back
slightly shorter and wider outside off, he goes back and works it to leg for one
bowls holding the seam and it comes in sharply to beat the batsman, almost through the gate
beats him with a similar delivery outside off this time
normal offspinner turning away outside off, pushed into the covers
fullish on the stumps, Kayes drives it elegantly straight down the ground but doesn't middle it falls right in between mid-on and mid-off
bangs in a short ball now and Kayes goes on the back foot to defend it
makes room to smack it away, but the ball angles away and beats him
now it lands between mid-off and cover! Drove on the up, the bounce got the upper part of the bat and it was in the air, but fell in between Kohli at cover and Yuvraj at mid-off
short ball outside off, that's too short and called wide by the square-leg umpire
closer to the stumps now, better length too, and Sabbir slogs and misses
drives that uppishly through the covers to Dhawan in the deep. They come back for the second by the time Dhawan's throw reaches Dhoni
towards off and middle, he goes back to turn it to leg
attempts a sweep for a short of length ball, gets a leg bye off his waist
Kayes goes in the crease for the shortish ball but that's a slider that comes in and he's beaten
comes into the batsman again, he tries to clip it to leg and misses
top-edge goes high and easy catch for Yuvraj at fine leg! Went ahead with the sweep but the ball wasn't that full and the bounce gets a top edge
bit if turn into Sabbir who works the ball to leg
slapped straight back to Pandya and the ball goes just over his head and to long off
he gets some width and steers the ball to sweeper cover for one, off the mark
short ball, Sabbir gets into a good position and pulls that in the gap and over the boundary at the cow corner for a six!
shuffles across a long way to scoop it and inside edges it just past the stumps. Dangerous
way too short and high over the batsman. Wide for height
fuller on the stumps now with the angle, Shakib guides it to point
makes room and charges down to slam it into the covers, well stopped by Yuvraj
length delivery towards off, nudged to leg for one
nicely tossed up outside off, it turns away a bit and takes the edge towards short third man
straighter outside off, he slices it to deep point for one
slammed for six! Came down the ground to take it on the full near the pads, and he hammered that with the spin to the midwicket boundary
this one goes away from around off and takes an edge towards short third man
turning towards the pads, Shakib gets a leg bye behind square
turns it in sharply from outside off, sliced to short third man where Nehra concedes one
fulls outside off, stays in the crease and drives it behind point

Shakib is run out, did he slip in the middle of the pitch? He tucked the ball towards midwicket and took off for the single, but Sabbir didn't respond. Shakib tries to turn around but it's too late as Rohit is the fielder with a quick throw
tiny mix up again as Mushfiqur steers the ball to short third man and goes for a run tentatively
full delivery angled in sharply, gets some bat in the nick of time
gets some room this time and slices it behind point. Dhawan gives it the charge and dives to his left in the deep, saves two
full on the pads, flicked to deep square leg for one
helps the ball with the turn to leg for one more
outside off now, he pushes it towards point
slightly full and he reverse sweeps it in the air and in the gap towards third man
nicely bowled around off, pushed to point
nudges the ball to midwicket with the turn for one
that must be the easiest catch of the match! Sabbir stays back and pulls the short ball with some power, gets a top edge and that goes high and behind him for Dhoni to take it easily
guides the ball from outside off to third man
brings the short ball in with the angle, called wide for height
back of length and towards the pads, pull-swats it towards deep square leg
pitches it well outside off this time and moves it away further
punches the back of length ball to point
slower delivery outside off, Mushfiqur swings and misses
slog-sweeps a fullish delivery and gets an edge to the leg side
Mushfiqur reverse sweeps and gets a leg bye
goes back in the crease and helps it to short fine leg
makes room and gets a full delivery, he sends it flying wide of short third man with a horizontal bat for four
that's gone through the fielder! Reverse sweep again and this time it goes through short third man for four
back of length towards leg, flicks and misses to take it on the pad
length delivery on middle and leg, Mahmudullah goes low and slogs that to deep backward square leg for four
straight to Rohit in the deep! Mahmudullah slogs a leg-side full toss and doesn't get the distance as he takes the aerial route this time
two in two for Nehra! Mortaza gets a fullish delivery and he drives that uppishly straight to point
sends a wide down the leg side past the left-handed batsman
better line - outside off and a bit full, drives it to point
angling towards the leg side and he nudges it to fine leg
flat and quick towards off stump, Taskin defends on the back foot
comes out dangerously against the turning ball, gets some width and drives that nicely through the gap in the covers for four
flat and just outside off, just misses the outside edge, just misses the off stump too!
bit of turn towards the middle stump, thick edge goes to off as he closes the face of the bat
another edge as the ball comes in, gets a single this time into the covers
works the ball behind square on leg from outside off for one
starts with a full toss well outside off, driven square for one
short ball around off, Taskin tries to pull and misses
pushes the full toss on middle and leg to mid-on, takes off for a run and is sent back
top-edge falls safe! He slogs a length delivery to the leg side, doesn't connect well and just clears mid on
full outside off now, Taskin swings and misses!
third full toss of the over, another one on the pads, and this time Taskin connects well and lofts that over long-on for six!
full outside off, he sweeps and misses
more towards the stumps now, worked to leg behind square for one
sends a flat one down leg for a wide
another flat delivery and another wide down leg
that was also going down leg, but Taskin's pad comes in the way
slides a flat and short of length ball outside off, he pokes and misses
105kph, according to the TV, fullish on the stumps and it's slogged to deep midwicket
full delivery outside off, driven to cover and India have won by 45 runs!
